radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver echotexture is normal without focal hepatic lesions. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation with the common bile duct measuring 4 mm. There is moderate gallbladder wall edema, but no evidence of gallstones, gallbladder distention, or sludge. The portal vein is patent with normal hepatopetal flow. Right kidney is normal measuring 9.6 cm. The pancreas is not visualized due to overlying bowel gas. There is no upper quadrant ascites.
